data.Subject: Github wiki vs Mozilla wiki
data.X-Abuse-and-DMCA-Info: Otherwise we will be unable to process your complaint properly
data.X-Spam-Status:
No, score=-0.039 tagged_above=-999 required=5
	tests=[BAYES_00=-0.05, HTML_MESSAGE=0.001, T_DKIM_INVALID=0.01]
	autolearn=ham

body.html:
Hello folks,

during yesterday's weekly meeting we talked about the need of starting to document the decisions that we are taking for Link. One of the questions was about whether we should use Github's or Mozilla's wiki for it. Both options looks good to me, but since there's already  some documentation at [1], I'll start adding more documentation there tomorrow unless someone disagrees and prefers Github's option.

Cheers,

/ Fernando

[1] https://wiki.mozilla.org/Project_Link
